name: 30th Annual GWN Dragon Boat Challenge
description:
Marking the end of the season for many, this marquee event gives crews the chance to go out with a bang, celebrating with two days of racing. Running for over 25 years, this classic festival is the granddaddy event of the MLDB series and a highlight of the racing season, with teams coming from all over Canada and the US.

On-site Festivities: Health & Wellness Zone, Left Field Brewery Beer Garden, Family Fun Zone & Performance Stage, Artisan Village, Vendor Marketplace, Food Trucks, and live bands on the Main Stage

name: Community Environment Day at Centennial Recreation Centre
description:
Join Councillor Ainslie (Ward 24) and the City of Toronto to help reduce the amount of waste going to landfill. Drop off household items for donation, electronics for reuse or recycling and household hazardous waste for proper disposal. 

Pick up free bagged compost while supplies last and kitchen catchers for organics ($7 each – cash, debit and credit accepted).

name: ExperienceTO: West Bend Historical Tour

location.name: Baird Park (In front of the West Bend "a city within a park" sign)

description: Join us for a public tour that will be a good experience for anyone; whether you're 8 or 80 years old, and whether you're a curious local, solo traveler, backpacker, part of a small groups of friends, or a newcomer.

name: Nature…Inspiration of Hope Reception
description: Through textured landscapes, abstract forms and mixed media, Dara Aram's works express hope, peace and the need for environmental preservation through an orchestra of colours.

name: Home Beyond Walls: Fall Fun at Scarborough Museum
description:
If walls could speak, what stories would they tell? Join the fun and engage in joyful placemaking with a variety of hands-on, minds-on activities, within and beyond Scarborough Museum's buildings and grounds. 

Sample scones fresh from the museum's kitchen, featuring red pepper jellies from this month's community feature: YAWDI's. If you enjoy a guided experience, museum staff are stationed to help navigate the museum site and its activities. 

Community Feature: YAWDI's
Veneise George is a wife, proud mom of two, entrepreneur, and the passionate force behind YAWDI'S—a premium condiment brand rooted in bold Caribbean flavors, cultural heritage, and handcrafted quality. Inspired by international tastes and made with all-natural, high-quality ingredients, YAWDI'S offers a vibrant range of pepper jellies, mustards, and jerk marinades that bring global flavor straight to your kitchen.

name: Nature's Diversity Around Us: Rewilding Through Art
description: Delve into the rich natural life around Cedar Ridge with Nathan Cole, Summer Artist-in-Residence, as he observes and documents local plants, animals and arthropods to highlight the incredible biodiversity that surrounds us. In his exhibition, Nature's Diversity Around Us: Rewilding Through Art, Nathan presents new scratchboard portraits alongside earlier works including photography, oil paintings, wood carvings and sculptural works. Together, these works aim to inspire greater connectivity between the wild places around us and the wild places in our hearts.
